# simple-node-server
## Version
v1.6
## Install
`npm i --save simple-node-server`
## Versions
### 1.0.0
- Typescript Node Server
- Controller Annotation
- RequestMapping Annotation
### 1.4.0
- jsonwebtoken Authentification
### 1.6.0
- annotation path variables
- annotation request params
- annotation request body
